name: J.P. Shibayama
effect: [Security] Play this card without paying its memory cost. [Your Turn] When this Tamer digivolves into a green Digimon, reduce the memory cost of the digivolution by 1.
digivolve_effect: ＜Piercing＞ (When this Digimon attacks and deletes an opponent's Digimon and survives the battle, it performs any security checks it normally would.)
